column2: I have vanquished [vamp_duel_loser.GetTitledFirstName] in personal combat!  What shall be [vamp_duel_loser.GetHerHis] fate?
[vamp_duel_loser.GetFirstName] will face the final death. As victor of the duel, I will execute [vamp_duel_loser.GetTitledFirstName].

The traditions of the Kindred state: "Thou art forbidden to destroy another of thy kind."  As [vamp_duel_victor.GetTitle], I claim the Right of Destruction.  It is the Final Death for [vamp_duel_loser.GetFirstName]

I will diablerize [vamp_duel_loser.GetTitledFirstName]. This will devour [vamp_duel_loser.GetHerHis] soul.  I will become publicly known as a diabolist and be less trusted by other kindred, but on the other hand my blood will grow stronger through the act.  The beast wants this to happen.

Your fangs sink deep into the body of [vamp_duel_loser.GetTitledFirstName]. You suck down the thick kindred blood like sucking marrow from a bone. It is ecstatic! Euphoric! The beast howls in delight inside your mind.

By driving a wooden stake through the heart of [vamp_duel_loser.GetTitledFirstName], [vamp_duel_loser.GetSheHe] will be incapacitated.  While [vamp_duel_loser.GetSheHe] can see and hear what is happening, [vamp_duel_loser.GetSheHe] will be immobilized. I will take [vamp_duel_loser.GetHerHim] as my prisoner, and they will be afflicted by paralysis until the stake is removed.
There is sound of breaking ribs as I thrust the wooden stake into the heart of [vamp_duel_loser.GetFirstName]. [vamp_duel_loser.GetSheHe] won't be going anywhere for awhile.
I'll decide what to do with [vamp_duel_loser.GetTitledFirstName], later.
I will spare [vamp_duel_loser.GetTitledFirstName], and in return [vamp_duel_loser.GetSheHe] will owe me a boon.
Look at this poor wretch!  As mighty as I am in combat, I am not without mercy. I release, [vamp_duel_loser.GetTitledFirstName] for a boon.
I have another fate in mind for [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName].
I will spare [vamp_duel_loser.GetTitledFirstName], and in return [vamp_duel_loser.GetSheHe] will owe me a boon.
After besting me in the fight, [vamp_duel_victor.GetTitledFirstName] drove a stale through my heart.  I can not move.  I am immobilized.
An attribute to globally rebalance duels to bring more characters under a 100 combat rating. Should be hidden to the player.
Your fangs sink deep into the body of [vamp_duel_loser.GetTitledFirstName]. You suck down last drop of [vamp_duel_loser.GetHerHis] blood. The beast is happy. Your hunger is satisfied... for now.
I will drain [vamp_duel_loser.GetTitledFirstName] of all [vamp_duel_loser.GetHerHis] blood.
[vamp_duel_loser.GetTitledFirstName] is drug in chains to your prison.  Plenty of time to decide what to do with [vamp_duel_loser.GetHerHim] later.
[vamp_duel_loser.GetTitledFirstName] body falls to the bloody ground. [vamp_duel_loser.GetHerHisCap] severed head rolls to a stop.
